scripts.init: git submodule init && git submodule update && yarn install && cd dashboard && yarn install && cd functions && yarn install && yarn run handle-config
scripts.dev: concurrently --names website,firebase "yarn run next-dev" "cd dashboard && yarn run emulators"
scripts.build: yarn run dump-code-version && yarn run handle-config && next build && next export -o build
scripts.deploy: yarn run handle-config && yarn run deploy-rewrites && yarn run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-all: cd dashboard && yarn run deploy-all && cd .. && yarn run deploy
scripts.deploy-rewrites: if ! node scripts/rewrites-deployed.js; then mkdir -p build && firebase deploy --only hosting; fi
scripts.next-dev: yarn run wait-for-emulators && yarn run handle-config && yarn run dump-code-version && NODE_ENV='development' node scripts/server.js
